item.title: Couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @imsocruel imsocruel
item.description:
@imsocruel wrote:

for the flashing items xEnt had in his server how would i change so the legends cape isnt flashing?

here is the thing im talking about, i want to keep the white party hat flashing but how do i change it to a different cape?

				[code]if(mob.animationCount[l2] == 155 || mob.animationCount[l2] == 226) {
					colour = lastCol;
					if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastChange > 1) {
						lastChange = System.currentTimeMillis();
						lastCol += (1000000 / 1000) / 4;
						if(lastCol > 20000000) {
							lastCol = -20000000;
						}
					}
				}[/code]

Edit i got it working just need to know if to change it to
